title: ToddyCatâ€™s New Hacking Tools Steal Outlook Emails and Microsoft 365 Access Tokens
description: The threat actor known as ToddyCat has been observed adopting new methods to obtain access to corporate email data belonging to target companies, including using a custom tool dubbed TCSectorCopy.
